WarlockLevel1Spells.Name: Charm Person
WarlockLevel1Spells.Description: You attempt to charm a humanoid you can see within range.

WarlockLevel1Spells.Name: Comprehend Languages
WarlockLevel1Spells.Description: For the duration, you understand the literal meaning of any spoken language that you hear.

WarlockLevel1Spells.Name: Expeditious Retreat
WarlockLevel1Spells.Description: This spell allows you to move at an incredible pace.

WarlockLevel1Spells.Name: Hellish Rebuke
WarlockLevel1Spells.Description: You point your finger, and the creature that damaged you is momentarily surrounded by hellish flames.

WarlockLevel1Spells.Name: Illusory Script
WarlockLevel1Spells.Description: You write on parchment, paper, or some other suitable writing material and imbue it with a potent illusion.

WarlockLevel1Spells.Name: Protection from Evil and Good
WarlockLevel1Spells.Description: Until the spell ends, one willing creature you touch is protected against certain types of creatures.

WarlockLevel1Spells.Name: Unseen Servant
WarlockLevel1Spells.Description: This spell creates an invisible, mindless, shapeless force that performs simple tasks at your command.
